ygData.subject: Back
ygData.msgSnippet: Allrighty, I m back from Defcon and me and Odo will start back up on gladiator after our week-long vacations. Major issues: sound and ai. BTW, the source is

Allrighty, I'm back from Defcon and me and Odo will start back up on
gladiator after our week-long vacations. Major issues: sound and ai.

BTW, the source is written to compile under Linux using g++ as the
compiler. It hasn't been tested (at least not to my knowledge) under any
other platform or compiler. The BSDs should work, but Windows is probably
a far stretch. If someone wants to install SDL and g++ for windows and
give it a try, let me know how it turns out. If someone has trouble
getting it to compile under Linux, (other than the sound issues), submit a
bug report.

I think I said this a few days ago, but everything works great except for
sound, some ai, and joystick. Other than that, there shouldn't be any
problems.

This _is_ and open source project, so don't hesitate to submit patches if
you fix something. And just for clarification: the 0.1 release isn't the
latest. In fact, it is very ancient. Click on the CVS link to get to the
latest.

- Zardus
